channel.title: Else if problem

item.title: Else if problem
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

it doesnt work, im using an PvP source, i have this above the if (safe()) {
(PvPplanet V1) public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); if (inwildy2 && !ib() && !isInBank() && !IsDead) { //int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; int level = (combat - 25); int High = (combat + 25); outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("" + level + "-" + High + "", 199); leftwild = 1; outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); IsInWilderness = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (safe()) { sendQuest("Test114", 199); } }

since the LOW level = -25 ( 25levels under ur cmb u can attack)
and the HIGHlevel = +25 (25 levels above ur cmb u can attack.)

In safezones it always shows -25 25
, if u can help with this please post:D

Read full topic
